DOC.brief_title: Trial Vitamin D Supplementation Prevention Influenza Other Respiratory Infections ( ViDiFlu )
DOC.detailed_description: The study population comprise shelter accommodation resident staff fulfil eligibility criterion . Half shelter accommodation scheme randomly allocate 2-monthly oral bolus vitamin D supplementation ( Vigantol oil ) period one year , half placebo . Participants follow one year .
